title: Customer_Analyzer v2: Enforce “approved messaging only” in Sales_Accelerator draft generation

sections.text: Update the draft generation pipeline to only use Customer_Analyzer messaging blocks that are marked approved and match the currently active messaging version. If the target record is in an `alignment_failed` state (from the existing sync check) or no approved blocks exist for the expected version, prevent generating a draft and return a structured “blocked” response for the UI to handle. Ensure the enforcement applies consistently across initiation and follow-up draft endpoints.
